It can be used for daily work or quick kids' homework check: 5 Ultra Fun Calculators RESEARCH Dr. Fu's main research areas are in data warehousing, data cube, data mining, databases, and algorithms. More recently, he works on delivery networks, social networks, and recommendation algorithms. In particular, he is interested in the structure and dynamic features of social networks and in community clustering.
